Package number

Class BigNumBinary

java.lang.Object
number.BigNumBinary
public class BigNumBinary
extends java.lang.Object
Big Numbers implementation in base 2^31 as part of ISMIN courses
Version:
1.0
Author:
Eric

    Calculate this montgomeryOperator b = this.b.r^-1 mod N
    BigNumBinary multiMontgomery​(BigNumBinary b)
    Montgomery Multiplication of this with b Used for performance enhancement Algorithm : Let c = a.b mod N with a,b,N 1024 bits, and C its Montgomery representation Pick R = 10^k with 10^(k-1) <= N <= 10^k Let V = - N^(-1) mod R Let A and B be the Montgomery representations of a and b as this : A = a.R mod N = A montgomeryOperator R² mod N B = b.R mod N = B montgomeryOperator R² mod N C = A montgomeryOperator B Finally, c = a.b mod N = C montgomeryOperator 1 /!\ N,R,V and R² mod have a precalculated value !!
    BigNumBinary multiply​(BigNumBinary p)
    Return a new BigNumBinary equals to this * p "Grade School" Algorithm Need to finish to implement Karatsuba to optimize time execution
    BigNumBinary pow​(BigNumBinary k)
    Return a new BigNumBinary equals to this^k mod N
    BigNumBinary productKaratsuba​(BigNumBinary p)
    (Not Operational yet) Returns a BigNumBinary whose value is this * product "Grade School" Algorithm
    BigNumBinary shiftLeft​(int n)
    Return a new BigNumBinary equals this << n
    BigNumBinary shiftRight​(int n)
    Return a new BigNumBinary
    BigNumBinary squareAndMultiply​(BigNumBinary k)
    Return this^k mod N Note : this must have its Montgomery Representation This condition is not checked !
    BigNumBinary substract​(BigNumBinary little)
    Returns a BigNumBinary whose value is the max(this,little) - min(this,little)

      Parameters:
      little - - a BigNumBinary
      Returns:
      if this > little return this- little, else little - this

    • multiMontgomery

      public BigNumBinary multiMontgomery​(BigNumBinary b)
      Montgomery Multiplication of this with b Used for performance enhancement Algorithm : Let c = a.b mod N with a,b,N 1024 bits, and C its Montgomery representation Pick R = 10^k with 10^(k-1) <= N <= 10^k Let V = - N^(-1) mod R Let A and B be the Montgomery representations of a and b as this : A = a.R mod N = A montgomeryOperator R² mod N B = b.R mod N = B montgomeryOperator R² mod N C = A montgomeryOperator B Finally, c = a.b mod N = C montgomeryOperator 1 /!\ N,R,V and R² mod have a precalculated value !!
      Parameters:
      b - - BigNumBinary to do the modular multiplication with
      Returns:
      a BigNumBinary equals to this * b mod MGY_N

    • montgomeryOperator

      public BigNumBinary montgomeryOperator​(BigNumBinary b, BigNumBinary N, BigNumBinary R, BigNumBinary V)
      Calculate this montgomeryOperator b = this.b.r^-1 mod N
      Parameters:
      b - - BigNumBinary
      N - - Constant BigNumBinary precalculated
      R - - Constant BigNumBinary precalculated
      V - - Constant BigNumBinary precalculated
      Returns:
      a BigNumBinary equals to this * b * R^-1 mod N

      public BigNumBinary pow​(BigNumBinary k)
      Return a new BigNumBinary equals to this^k mod N
      Parameters:
      k - - exponent
      Returns:
      this^k mod N

      public BigNumBinary squareAndMultiply​(BigNumBinary k)

      Parameters:
      k - - BigNumBinary equals to the exponent
      Returns:
      a BigNumBinary equals to this^k mod N
